text: The APEX flight academy based in Taitung Airport, Taiwan, is a flight school started in 2014.APEX flight academy d√©colle dans le ciel de Taiwan Known because it is the first and only school approved by the Civil Aviation Authority in Taiwan. It has aircrafts and flight simulators. In 2018, the school signed an partnership deal with the French Civil Aviation University to conduct EASA certified trainings.ENAC and APEX team up to offer EASA pilot training programs in Taiwan ==References== == Further reading == * Official website Category:Aviation organizations Category:2014 establishments in Asia Category:2010s establishments in Taiwan Category:Organizations based in Taiwan
title: APEX flight academy
